table.name: Fiendish Incursion Encounters
table.caption: Fiendish Incursion Encounters
rows: {@dice 1d4} {@creature Barlgura||barlguras} (attitude: {@dice 1d4 + 1}) capering around a blasphemous idol
1 {@creature arcanaloth} (attitude: {@dice 1d12}) searching for a tempting bit of lost lore
2 {@creature Chain Devil||chain devils} (attitude: {@dice 1d6}) suspending corpses on spiked chains
1 {@creature fury of Kostchtchie|BGG} performing a rite with 2 {@creature Troll||trolls} (attitude for all: {@dice 1d6})
1 {@creature echo of Demogorgon|BGG} (attitude: {@dice 1d4 + 1}) building a two-headed effigy from corpses
1 {@creature stalker of Baphomet|BGG} (attitude: {@dice 1d4 + 1}) and 2 {@creature minotaur} cultists (attitude: {@dice 1d4 + 1}) stalking a {@creature scout} (attitude: {@dice 1d10 + 4})
1 {@creature maw of Yeenoghu|BGG} with 4 {@creature Gnoll||gnolls} and 4 {@creature Hyena||hyenas} (attitude for all: {@dice 1d4 + 1}), all stalking prey
1 {@creature marilith} (attitude: {@dice 1d4 + 2}) searching for a renowned giant smith to forge six new swords
1 {@creature cambion} (attitude: {@dice 1d8}) trading verbal jabs with 1 {@creature succubus} (attitude: {@dice 1d12})
1 {@creature fire hellion|BGG} (attitude: {@dice 1d6}) conjuring 1 {@creature bone devil} (attitude: {@dice 1d12}) into a red-hot iron circle
